name: tm14
effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Blizzard to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A vicious snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.
flavor_text.emerald: A brutal snow-and- wind attack that may freeze the foe.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: The foe is blasted with a blizzard. It may freeze the foe solid.
